This method isn't normally used, but is convenient when running probes: it lets you easily clone a heatbug and drag it into the model.

F

findExtremeType$X$Y(int, HeatCell) - class HeatSpace のメソッド
Search the 9 cell neighbourhood for the requested extreme (cold or hot) The X and Y arguments are used both as input (where to search from) and as output (pointers are filled with the coordinate of the extreme).

HeatCell - class HeatCell.
Wrapper object for an (x,y) co-ordinate

HeatSpace - class HeatSpace.
The HeatSpace is a simple object to represent the heat in the world: a spatial variable.
HeatSpace(Zone, int, int, double, double) - class HeatSpace のコンストラクタ
 
Heatbug - class Heatbug.
Heatbugs are agents in a 2d world with simple behaviour: if too cold, move to warmer spot if too warm, move to cooler spot.

HeatbugModelSwarm - class HeatbugModelSwarm.

HeatbugObserverSwarm - class HeatbugObserverSwarm.
